refsection.title: PARAMETERS
refsection.para:
y Matrix containing the activation, one pattern per column. For each pattern:
1 y(i) = -------------- 1 + exp[-x(i)] x Matrix containing the total neuronal input, one pattern per column. For each pattern: each x(i) for the corresponding i-th neuron on the current layer.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: This function is the default neuronal activation function. Any other, user defined, function should have the same input and output format for variables.
